    • Method Detail

      • addBcoNamespace

        static String addBcoNamespace(String input,
                              boolean fullNamespace)
                       throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the input string with the bco namespace prefix.
        Parameters:
        input - is the string, which should be extended with the bco namespace prefix.
        fullNamespace - sets the kind of namespace. If true the full namespace is added as prefix. Otherwise the short form ("NAMESPACE:") is added.
        Returns:
        the string with namespace prefix.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • getLocalName

        static String getLocalName(String input)
                    throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the local name of the input string. Means the prefix (bco namespace (long/short) and xsd (long) are cropped. Hint: the jena method getLocalName() doesn't work correctly by all names, cause of rdf historical reasons...
        Parameters:
        input - is the input string with containing local name.
        Returns:
        the local name.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • addXsdDateTime

        static String addXsdDateTime(String input)
                      throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method transforms the input string to a literal with the data type "xsd:dateTime".
        Parameters:
        input - is the string, which should be transformed to a dateTime literal.
        Returns:
        a literal string with the data type "xsd:dateTime".
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • firstCharToLowerCase

        static String firstCharToLowerCase(String input)
                            throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method transforms the first char of the input string to lower case.
        Parameters:
        input - is the string, which should be transformed.
        Returns:
        the input string with first char in lower case.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • firstCharToUpperCase

        static String firstCharToUpperCase(String input)
                            throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method transforms the first char of the input string to upper case.
        Parameters:
        input - is the string, which should be transformed.
        Returns:
        the input string with first char in upper case.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • getServiceTypeName

        static String getServiceTypeName(rst.domotic.service.ServiceTemplateType.ServiceTemplate.ServiceType serviceType)
                          throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the service type name in camel case, e.g. PowerStateService.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - is the service type, which name should be returned.
        Returns:
        the service type name in camel case.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • getUnitTypeName

        static String getUnitTypeName(rst.domotic.unit.UnitTemplateType.UnitTemplate.UnitType unitType)
                       throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the unit type name in camel case, e.g. ColorableLight.
        Parameters:
        unitType - is the service type, which name should be returned.
        Returns:
        the unit type name in camel case.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • getCamelCaseName

        static String getCamelCaseName(String input)
                        throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method transforms the input string from upper case to camel case.
        Parameters:
        input - is the string in upper case.
        Returns:
        the input string in camel case.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null.

      • addQuotationMarks

        static String addQuotationMarks(String input)
        Method returns the input string in literal form, means quotation marks (e.g. "input").
        Parameters:
        input - is the string without quotation marks.
        Returns:
        a literal string (input string with quotation marks).

      • getServiceTypeNameFromStateMethodName

        static String getServiceTypeNameFromStateMethodName(String stateMethodName)
                                             throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the service type name of the state method name (e.g. getPowerState: powerStateService).
        Parameters:
        stateMethodName - is the state method name, which should be transformed.
        Returns:
        the service type name in camel case (first char lower case).
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the input is null or is no valid state (name).
